nodes.text: Circa 9 ABY, a lava meerkat was saved from being beheaded and eaten by a gang of Aqualish by Marshal Carasynthia Dune in the former Mandalorian covert on Nevarro. The creature showed affection to Dune, who gave it something to eat and assured it of its safety. Later, when New Republic officer Carson Teva offered the position of official Marshal of the New Republic to Dune, the meerkat was still hanging around Dune like a stray pet.
